EmailTemplate.description: Email template for - when the case status changed to 'Need Clarification'
EmailTemplate.name: Need Clarification for Internal Case
EmailTemplate.subject: Clarification request for Case {!Case.CaseNumber} : {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.OwnerFirstName},
We require some clarification regarding your case ' {!Case.CaseNumber} : {!Case.Subject} '.
Please provide us the clarification in the ‘Case Comments’ section and change the status of the case to ‘Clarification Provided’.
Regards, Technology Support
